alert.note: Alert for Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 4:55PM MST until September 13 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MST FOR NORTH OF LINDEN IN NAVAJO COUNTY... At 453 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ned Lake, or 8 miles northwest of Show Low, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Show Low, Shumway, Schoens Lake, Fool Hollow Lake, Telephone Lake, Ned Lake, Pintail Lake, White Mountain Lake Estates, Fool Hollow Lake Campground, and White Mountain Lake. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 333 and 336. State Route 77 between mile markers 346 and 354. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
